senses.sense_definition: К тому же, вдобавок; используется для присоединения информации, которая дополняет или усиливает сказанное ранее.

examples.text: Эта задача была очень сложной, и <w>притом</w> срочной.

target_lang_translations.en: This task was very difficult, and urgent <w>at that</w>.

examples.text: Вася из хорошей семьи, <w>притом</w> он работает в полиции.

target_lang_translations.en: Vasya is from a good family; <w>moreover</w>, he works in the police.

target_lang_definitions.en: In addition, moreover; used to attach information that supplements or reinforces what was said earlier.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: Formal; used to add information that supports or reinforces the previous statement.
Used to emphasize an additional point, often as a stronger reason.
Formal; in addition to what has just been said.
Used in the phrase 'and ... at that' to emphasize a description or quality.
